text: Tomara jene rakha tomadera madhye allahara rasula rayechena. Tini yadi aneka bisaye tomadera abadara mene nena, tabe tomara'i kasta pabe. Kintu allaha tomadera antare imanera mahabbata srsti kare diyechena ebam ta hrdayagrahi kare diyechena. Paksantare kuphara, papacara o napharamanira prati ghrna srsti kare diyechena. Tara'i satpatha abalambanakari.
